resources.string: 2.Add Emergency widget on lock screen and simultaneously remove other lock screen widgets.
1.Make sure to keep GPS always on.

How to add widgets? 
-- Turn off the display of your smartphone or tablet.
-- Switch it on again to view the lock screen.
-- Once you're there, swipe left or right.
-- When the '+' option appears, tap on it.
-- A list of widgets will be displayed you'll be asked to choose one.
-- Add emergency widget to lock screen.
-- And finally remove the default clock widget from lock screen.
